originalText.text: Fohlio has made managing our larger projects so much easier! We love having the ability to add all the details for each item. Many other software platforms aren't as robust or sensitive to the construction aspect of design. The 'share' feature allows us to send specifications to clients, vendors, and contractors in different views. Being able to select which phase or item view with each 'share' makes so much more sense than all the cut and paste we did previously. This is really the premier interior design project management software on the market.

originalText.text: Fohlio has been an amazing tool for our large interior design projects.  It tracks everything you need.  And their customer service is stellar.  I also appreciate all their learning resources and classes too.

text.text: Fohlio has been an amazing tool for our large interior design projects.  It tracks everything you need.  And their customer service is stellar.  I also appreciate all their learning resources and classes too.

originalText.text: I am a Senior Interior Designer and have had all types of professional experience, in specifying product (finishes as well as FF&E) utilizing all different types of programs. I will say this... Fohlio has been the most efficient, consistent, and easy to use. What I appreciate most is their "chat" feature- which I have always received an immediate response regarding a glitch, issue, and sometimes my personal user confusion. It is an incredible program and I am very grateful our firm uses it! Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Fohlio keeps my interior design project data perfectly organized. It also saves a ton of time so that I can review current and past project info easily and efficiently. Creating mood boards and tear sheets enhances my client presentations. When I first learned about the program I tried it out and it was very easy to navigate. The support team is also excellent whenever I might have a question. I'm so grateful to Fohlio! Highly recommend!

originalText.text: We have been working with Fohlio to organize our projects and clients for just over a month. All of the staff are very helpful and responsive. The program is very versatile, and a major time saver when adding items to projects. We are really looking forward to organizing new projects and communicating with Suppliers and Clients through this program.
